title: To Find My Brother Ara
sinopse:
Roy is an orphan, whose only remaining family is her older brother. She was 6 the last time they had seen each other, as he left to clear their dead father's name and honor as a policeman. 12 years have passed and she's now a small fry in a rough part of New York, but still looking for her missing brother...

(Source: MangaUpdates)
